name: Ghost (Longest Egg Games, Aviv, TTIO)
description:
(This was a originally a submission for #LOWREZJAM 2016.)

You are Ghost: Mercenary Super-Hacker.

Your mission: Break in, hack terminals, get out. Don't get caught.

Fail, and you die.

Controls:

  • Left-Right arrows: Move left or right
  • Space: Interact with certain objects. (Terminals, Bins and Plants)
  • Up-Down: Move up or down when next to stairs.

Thanks to:

Medbh Campbell for inspiration, Jessica for thoughts, help and some amazing art work, OpenGameArt contributors for sound effects and music (a full list is at the bottom of the page), the makers of PyGame, Python and SDL, and Devi, for inspiring us with the game jam!
